Package com.almasb.fxgl.input

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Input
    Provides access to mouse state and allows binding of actions to key and mouse events
    InputBinding
    Represents an input binding of a single action and a trigger (key or mouse button) to which the action is bound.
    InputMapping
    Basic mapping of action name to its trigger.
    Mouse
    Holds mouse state information.
    UserAction
    Represents a user action which is typically triggered when a key or a mouse event has occurred.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActionType
    Action type defines when an action needs to be executed.
    InputModifier
    A key modifier applied to an input event.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    OnUserAction
    Marks a method that it should be called when user triggers an action.
